items.name: meatStorage
items.content: Separate storage for raw meat away from cooked food.
items.safeDescription: This tub in the fridge has raw meat in it.
items.unsafeDescription: This tub in the fridge has raw meat and vegetables together.

items.name: foodTempCold
items.content: Food maintained at safe temperatures: ≤41°F for cold foods
items.safeDescription: The temperature in the fridge is at 37° F.
items.unsafeDescription: The temperature in the fridge is at 42° F.

items.name: foodTempHot
items.content: Food maintained at safe temperatures: ≥135°F for hot foods
items.safeDescription: The hot plate is at 137° F.
items.unsafeDescription: The hot plate is at 131° F.

items.name: paperProducts
items.content: Paper products and other service items are stored in a clean place until used. (utensils, plate, wrapper, to-go boxes…)
items.safeDescription: The service items are all in an organized container.
items.unsafeDescription: The service items are all strewn about on the counter.

items.name: cuttingBoard
items.content: Cutting boards are smooth, easily cleanable and in good repair. Maplewood is the only wood approved for food contact
items.unsafeDescription: This cutting board is rough and hard to clean.

items.name: handWash
items.content: Truck has separate sink exclusively for hand-washing.
items.safeDescription: There is a sink specifically for hand-washing.
items.unsafeDescription: There is a small stove next to the sink.

items.name: bucket
items.content: Clean wiping cloths and sanitizing buckets on hand.
items.safeDescription: A bucket of santizing solution. It has clean wiping cloths nearby.

items.name: chemicals
items.content: Cleaning products or products with toxic chemicals are kept in safe, designated area
items.safeDescription: Toxic cleaning products are safe away from the food.

items.name: firstAid
items.safeDescription: This first-aid kit comes with all kinds of necessary tools and supplies.

items.name: fireExtinguisher
items.content: Wall-mounted, minimum 10 BC rated approved fire extinguisher accessible
items.safeDescription: This BC-rated fire extinguisher is wall-mounted.
